metadata.name: Blanket of Tranquility
metadata.description:
Yosemite under a blanket of snow is a sight to behold. I have photographed Valley View so many times and this is the one that has remained with me, etched in my mind. When that sliver of sunlight fell on El Capitan, I knew this was the time to remember Yosemite under a blanket of tranquility.

Artist: Arwin Levinson  
Collection: Envisioned  
Type: 1/1
